verbs.description: I [V: ’ve] had my differences with fellow Patheos blogger and National Review contributor David French over the years , but I give him credit for refusing to join his fellow Christian conservatives on the Trump bandwagon . Bryan Fischer is now accusing him of casting a “ curse ” on Trump supporters , which he is now dutifully “ rebuking . ” Last week , …
